an10.117:1.1: Atha kho sangaravo brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an10.117:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho sangaravo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.117:1.3: “kim nu kho, bho gotama, orimam tiram, kim parimam tiran”ti?
an10.117:1.4: “Micchaditthi kho, brahmana, orimam tiram, sammaditthi parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.5: micchasankappo orimam tiram, sammasankappo parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.6: micchavaca orimam tiram, sammavaca parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.7: micchakammanto orimam tiram, sammakammanto parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.8: micchaajivo orimam tiram, sammaajivo parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.9: micchavayamo orimam tiram, sammavayamo parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.10: micchasati orimam tiram, sammasati parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.11: micchasamadhi orimam tiram, sammasamadhi parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.12: micchananam orimam tiram, sammananam parimam tiram;
an10.117:1.13: micchavimutti orimam tiram, sammavimutti parimam tiranti.
an10.117:1.14: Idam kho, brahmana, orimam tiram, idam parimam tiranti.
